description: This file defines a FastAPI web application to manage student records, including data models, API endpoints for CRUD operations, and in-memory storage of student data.

classes.name: StudentIn
classes.description: Request model for creating/updating a student, with validation for name and class fields.

classes.name: StudentOut
classes.description: Response model for a student, including a unique ID.

classes.name: StatusResponse
classes.description: Model for API responses indicating success/failure and messages.

methods.name: health_check()
methods.description: Health check endpoint returning a simple message.

methods.name: get_students( sort_by: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Sort field: name, class, or marks"), order: Optional[str] = Query("asc", description="asc for ascending, desc for descending"), filter_class: Optional[str] = Query(None, alias="class", description="Filter by class/section"), min_marks: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=0, le=100, description="Filter students with marks >= min_marks"), max_marks: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=0, le=100, description="Filter students with marks <= max_marks") )
methods.description: Retrieve a filtered and sorted list of students.

methods.name: create_student(student: StudentIn)
methods.description: Create and add a new student record.

methods.name: update_student( student_id: str = Path(..., description="ID of the student to update"), updated: StudentIn = ..., )
methods.description: Update an existing student by ID.

methods.name: delete_student( student_id: str = Path(..., description="ID of the student to delete") )
get_student_by_id( student_id: str = Path(..., description="ID of the student to retrieve") )
methods.description: Retrieve details of a single student by ID.

ctags.name: delete_student
ctags.signature: ( student_id: str = Path(..., description="ID of the student to delete") )

ctags.name: get_student_by_id
ctags.signature: ( student_id: str = Path(..., description="ID of the student to retrieve") )

ctags.name: get_students
ctags.signature: ( sort_by: Optional[str] = Query(None, description="Sort field: name, class, or marks"), order: Optional[str] = Query("asc", description="asc for ascending, desc for descending"), filter_class: Optional[str] = Query(None, alias="class", description="Filter by class/section"), min_marks: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=0, le=100, description="Filter students with marks >= min_marks"), max_marks: Optional[int] = Query(None, ge=0, le=100, description="Filter students with marks <= max_marks") )

ctags.name: id
ctags.pattern: /^    id: str = Field(..., description="The unique identifier of the student")$/

ctags.name: marks
ctags.pattern: /^    marks: int = Field(..., ge=0, le=100, description="The marks scored by the student (0-100)")$/

ctags.name: name
ctags.pattern: /^    name: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=100, description="The full name of the stude/

ctags.name: student_class
ctags.pattern: /^    student_class: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=20, description="The class or secti/

ctags.name: update_student
ctags.signature: ( student_id: str = Path(..., description="ID of the student to update"), updated: StudentIn = ..., )
